subject: Node
question: To use data from an external file in another js file on a node application, is it enough to require the external file? If so or if not, explain it.
answer: No, it is still necessary in the external file to export the data we want to expose by using the "module.exports." object and appending a new property that will hold the data we are exposing, like "module.exports.exposedData = something;"
